turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Renegade, LLC.
turn.2: Renegade, LLC  Renegade, LLC is a social media and marketing consultancy based in New York City.
turn.4: It was founded in 1996 and originally owned by Dentsu Holdings USA, Inc.
turn.6: It is now owned by its founder, Drew Neisser.
turn.8: Neisser and Shigeo Sugawa began discussing the idea of a new ad agency with Dentsu in 1993.
turn.10: Renegade Marketing Group, as it was known originally, began working with Panasonic in 1994 by conceiving the TrafficCam, a program that used billboards in prime locations to provide Panasonic-branded traffic reporting to local TV and radio stations.
turn.12: In 1997, the company named and launched Panasonic’s ruggedized laptop, the Toughbook.
